question.content: What does Bill do after having some drinks?
question.choice: He sleeps.
He runs out of the restaurant.
He goes to the bathroom
He sings with Mr. Jackson.
He wakes up in the morning.
He wakes up in the afternoon.
He wakes up in the midnight.
He wakes up in the evening.

question.content: What does he want to do after he wakes up?
question.choice: He wants more drinks.
He wants to sleep again.
He wants to go out.
He wants to eat something.

question.content: Why does he call Mr. Jackson?
question.choice: He wants to know if he can drink something.
He wants to have breakfast in the restaurant.
He wants to know where he is.
He wants to know when Mr. Jackson opens the restaurant.

question.content: Why doesn't Mr. Jackson open the restaurant for Bill?
question.choice: Because he doesn't like Bill.
Because he doesn't know Bill.
Because it is already in the midnight and he isn't happy about that.
Because he always closes the restaurnat at that time.
